name: VMWareTask
description: Create VMs, create, delete or restore virtual machines snapshot
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: vCenterConnection
inputs.label: vCenter Server Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: VMWare vCenter Server connection to target for deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action to perform on the VMWare Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: vmList
inputs.label: Virtual Machine Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of the virtual machine's names. For example, FabrikamWeb, FabrikamDB, FabrikamTest.

inputs.name: template
inputs.label: Template
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of the template to use for creating virtual machines.

inputs.name: targetlocation
inputs.label: Location
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a datacenter or VM folder name to create the new virtual machine in.

inputs.name: computeType
inputs.label: Compute Resource Type
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a cluster, host or resource pool to run this virtual machine.

inputs.name: hostname
inputs.label: Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the host to run the Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: clustername
inputs.label: Cluster Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the cluster to run the Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: resourcepoolname
inputs.label: Resource Pool Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the resource pool to run the Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: snapshotName
inputs.label: Snapshot Name
inputs.visibleRule: action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Revert Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Delete Snapshot of Virtual Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the snapshot of the Virtual Machines.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Notes
inputs.visibleRule: action = Take Snapshot of Virtual Machines || action = Deploy Virtual Machines using Template
